name: Football Soccer League
description:
BE THE NEXT CHAMPION! Pursue your dream of becoming a real football winner. You have never imagined playing of football game full of fun and thrill. Lead your soccer team through various real soccer game tournaments.
Modes:
Single Match
• Football Leagues
• Flick Kicks (New)
• Football Worldcup
Real soccer experience with physics-based football features. We designed this offline soccer game with wholesome world-cup experience. Begin your career with smooth flow of 3D football soccer league!
And to give this soccer game more realistic touch we added the penalty mode. Now do the real soccer goals endlessly. Best football game experience because of user friendly controls; kick the foot ball to shoot in goal.
Free football Features
• Tones of football soccer leagues
• 100+ football matches
• Different world soccer teams
• Foot ball game match against tones of teams
• Purchase new Indian football & stadiums
• Totally free football game to install and play
Give us your valuable feedback on this world football app! Our team would respond to any suggestions regarding gameplay of world soccer game.
